name: alkaline
description: A library for common JavaScript utilities

scripts.build: npx tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run generate-umbrella && npm run resolve-imports
scripts.fix-header-comment: node scripts/fix-header-comment.js -n Alkaline -d sources/public -d sources/private -d tests -d scripts
scripts.generate-umbrella: node scripts/generate-umbrella.js distribution/index.js distribution/public && echo > distribution/index.d.ts
